import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Modal, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import firebase from "../services/firebase"; function ProductForm() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [image, setImage] = useState(null); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleImgUpload = (event) => { setImage(URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0])); }; return ( <> 新增商品
產品名稱 產品類別 原價 特價
); } export default ProductForm;
